data.title: Week full of crypto controversies: Former Biden advisor criticized crypto's legal use cases, Binance's arbitration request denied.
data.description: In the world of cryptocurrency, the past week was filled with significant events. A former advisor to Joe Biden, Jared Bernstein, criticized the legal use cases of crypto, claiming it has "almost zero legal use cases" and is favored by scammers. He also dismissed the notion that crypto's volatility can be justified by its early stage. On a separate front, a federal judge denied Binance's request for arbitration in a customer-related case. This denial marks a notable development for the popular cryptocurrency exchange. For more information on these stories, visit the full articles online.

data.title: Bahamas Supreme Court reviews Rosewood Exuma plan, highlighting Yntegra Group's development model.150 countries celebrate World Seagrass Day.
data.description: The Save Exuma Alliance has highlighted a case that examines The Bahamas' implementation of modern marine protections amid the growth of luxury tourism in Exuma. On March 1, 2026, coinciding with World Seagrass Day, 159 nations are observing these efforts. The Bahamas' Supreme Court is currently undergoing its initial pivotal evaluation concerning this matter.

data.title: Lanner debuts AstraEdge™ AI Servers at MWC 2026 in Barcelona for AI-RAN, integrating AI inference, RAN functions, & packet processing at the network edge.
data.description: During the Mobile World Congress 2026 held in Barcelona, Lanner Electronics introduced the latest AstraEdge™ AI Servers designed specifically for enhancing AI-driven Radio Access Networks (AI-RAN). These servers are capable of facilitating AI inference, RAN operations, and high-performance packet processing simultaneously at the network edge. The event took place in BARCELONA, Spain, showcasing Lanner Electronics' commitment to innovation and advancement in the tech industry.

data.title: AirGreen releases 2026 rankings for best heat pumps in Montreal and Quebec, aiding homeowners with $6,700 subsidies.
data.description: AirGreen Climatisation & Chauffage has recently published its comprehensive 2026 buyer's guide and brand ratings for Quebec residents. This guide aims to assist homeowners in Quebec in understanding and complying with the new SEER2 standards. Additionally, Quebec residents may benefit from $6,700 in subsidies under the LogisVert program. The company is based in Montreal and is recognized for providing top-notch services in the field of air conditioning and heating.

data.title: Vacation Deal Hub expands luxury resort partnerships to 20+ groups across U.S., Mexico, and Dominican Republic, aiming for enhanced booking experience, with a support team available for help.
data.description: A more streamlined and secure booking process and an expanded U.S.-based Vacation Support team are now offered by Vacation Deal Hub. The company aims to provide a simplified and more confident way to book unforgettable getaways. The enhancements were announced in Ft. Lauderdale, Florida, and Sheridan, Wyoming on March 1, 2026. These changes aim to improve the online booking experience for users and provide better customer support. Visit VacationDealHub.com for more information.

data.title: PRO-Craft Dental Lab to showcase at 5 US dental conventions in 2026, elevating practices with quality restorations.
data.description: PRO-Craft Dental Laboratory, a renowned provider of top-notch dental restorations, will be showcasing its services at five upcoming dental conventions. By attending these events, dental practitioners can discover how PRO-Craft can enhance their practices. The company's participation in the conventions highlights its commitment to innovation and excellence in the field of dentistry.PRO-Craft will be present at conventions in various locations to reach a wider audience, including MURRIETA, Calif., on March 1, 2026. This opportunity will allow dental professionals to learn more about the advanced solutions offered by PRO-Craft and how they can benefit from partnering with the laboratory. It's a chance to explore cutting-edge dental technology and improve the quality of care provided to patients in the industry.

data.title: Nokia unveils Doksuri Remote Radio Heads as part of AirScale portfolio for premium network performance in AI-RAN era. #MWC26
data.description: Today, Nokia revealed a significant update to its AirScale portfolio by introducing Doksuri Remote Radio Heads (Radios).

data.title: Nokia and Ericsson team up to boost automation in networks, aiming for major advancements in technology.
data.description: Nokia and Ericsson have revealed a groundbreaking partnership today focused on advancing intelligent automation.

data.title: Nokia partners with NVIDIA for AI-RAN, advancing towards AI-Native 6G at MWC26 with new customer integrations.
data.description: Nokia has reported notable advancements in its strategic collaboration with NVIDIA in the field of AI-RAN technology. The partnership has led to the incorporation of AI solutions for customers, resulting in successful functional tests. This development highlights the progress made by Nokia and NVIDIA in leveraging artificial intelligence for Radio Access Network enhancements.

data.title: Greg Abel's 1st shareholder letter focuses on stewardship at Berkshire, emphasizing integrity, decentralized leadership, and $370B+ in cash and Treasury holdings. Cahillane's plan halt at Kraft Heinz tests long-horizon strategy. Berkshire aims for sustainable growth under new CEO Abel.
data.description: Berkshire Hathaway Inc.'s new CEO, Gregory E. Abel, shared his first annual shareholder letter emphasizing the importance of maintaining the company's stewardship-first culture. The letter highlights the company's commitment to treating outside capital as a trust and maintaining decision-making integrity. Abel also stressed the significance of a long-horizon mindset and decentralized leadership. The company holds over $370 billion in cash and U.S. Treasury holdings and prefers using debt sparingly. The letter comes amidst attention on Kraft Heinz, where Abel supports CEO Steve Cahillane amid a pause in the previously outlined split plan. Kraft Heinz reported a 20.2% decline in fourth-quarter adjusted EPS, outlining a $600 million effort to restart growth. Abel's vision for Berkshire focuses on financial strength as a competitive advantage and operational execution through decentralized teams. He highlighted Precision Castparts’ effective fire response as an example of quick and strategic decision-making under pressure.

data.title: Dow Jones futures to react as U.S. & Israel strike Iran; Iran vows revenge for Khamenei. Oil prices impacted.
data.description: The ongoing attacks by the U.S. and Israel on Iran, coupled with Iran's vow for retaliation following threats from Ayatollah Khamenei, are expected to impact Dow Jones futures and oil prices significantly. The market will closely watch the developments as tensions escalate between the involved parties. Traders are bracing for potential fluctuations in the market as a result of these geopolitical events. The situation remains fluid as investors assess the implications of the attacks and Iran's promised revenge, adding uncertainty to the financial markets.

data.title: China's HE leads in green energy transition with intelligently manufactured power systems. - Harbin Electric Corporation driving low-carbon vision.
data.description: In Harbin, China, on March 1, 2026, Harbin Electric Corporation (HE), a leading entity in China's power equipment sector, is spearheading the advancement of innovative power systems with a focus on sustainability. HE, the country's inaugural state-owned enterprise for exporting large-scale power equipment, is dedicated to promoting green and low-carbon solutions.

data.title: US-Taiwan trade tensions escalate after Supreme Court decision, Amazon invests $12B in US, Sen. Mark Kelly calls for AI regulations.
data.description: Sen. Mark Kelly discusses the impact of artificial intelligence on the workforce and calls for protective regulations. Trade tensions between the US and Taiwan escalate after the Supreme Court strikes down Trump's tariff authority. Taiwan acts swiftly to maintain trade benefits post the ruling. US-China AI tensions rise as concerns mount over the usage of advanced chips by Chinese startup DeepSeek. Secretary of War warns Anthropic about Pentagon supply chain exclusion. Key financial highlights: Keysight Technologies beat earnings estimates, Dillard's earnings exceeded expectation but sales dropped, Planet Fitness surpassed earnings and sales projections, Tempus AI met loss estimates but beat revenue projections. Amazon invests $12 billion in Louisiana, Alibaba launches new coding plan, Reddit's stock gains traction. Full story available on Benzinga.com.

data.title: Tokenized gold drives '100% weekend price discovery' as CME futures stay closed. PAXG and XAUt lead the way with almost all gold price determination.
data.description: During weekends when CME futures markets are closed, tokenized gold markets such as PAXG and XAUt play a crucial role in determining gold prices. These markets now oversee the price discovery for almost all gold trading activities.

data.title: TECNO will launch CAMON 50 Series and AI ecosystem at MWC 2026 in Barcelona, showcasing latest imaging and AI tech.
data.description: In Barcelona, Spain on March 1, 2026, TECNO, a pioneering brand driven by AI, is preparing to showcase a range of groundbreaking advancements at the MWC 2026 event. The highlight of their presentation will be the introduction of the CAMON 50 Series, the newest line of smartphones featuring advanced imaging and AI technologies. Additionally, they will unveil their AI Product, demonstrating their commitment to innovation and cutting-edge solutions.

data.title: iHerb's California Gold Nutrition Creatine hailed for purity and quality by Expert Consumers, leading choice in 2026.
data.description: On March 1, 2026, California Gold Nutrition was acknowledged by Expert Consumers as a top pick in the creatine category for 2026. The market trend of ingredient transparency and manufacturing standards is impacting consumer choices. This recognition highlights California Gold Nutrition's position in meeting consumer preferences.

data.title: LDO aims for $0.32-$0.34 by March end, gaining 6.66% daily with RSI at 34.82 signaling potential bounce.
data.description: Lido DAO (LDO) is currently experiencing a strong upward trend, reflecting a significant daily increase of 6.66%. The digital asset is aiming to break through the resistance zone situated between $0.32 and $0.34. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) stands at 34.82, indicating a possible oversold position that could lead to a rebound for Lido DAO in the near future. The price forecast for LDO is optimistic, with a short-term prediction being made.

data.title: Aave price aims for $137 by March, currently at $113.11 with 6.70% rebound. Neutral RSI at 40.90; key resistance at $125.
data.description: Aave has experienced a 6.70% increase, bringing its price to $113.11, as market analysts are closely watching for a potential breakout towards the $137 target. The technical indicators currently exhibit a neutral Relative Strength Index (RSI) at 40.90, with significant resistance expected at the $125 mark in the near term.

data.title: HBAR price aims for $0.11 by mid-March with neutral momentum. Current at $0.10, could hit $0.11 or drop to $0.09.
data.description: The cryptocurrency Hedera (HBAR) is currently trading at $0.10, displaying conflicting indicators with a neutral Relative Strength Index (RSI) and a bearish Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD). Analysis indicates a possible upward movement towards a resistance level of $0.11, or a downward trend towards a support level of $0.09.
